title: ICE: issue-73050.rs with generic_const_exprs: !value.has_escaping_bound_vars()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `./src/test/ui/async-await/issue-73050.rs` ```Rust // check-pass // edition:2018 #[allow(unused)] async fn foo<'a>() { let _data = &mut [0u8; { 1 + 4 }]; bar().await } async fn bar() {} fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0-nightly (e55c53c57 2022-07-23) binary: rustc commit-hash: e55c53c57e953a4f5716461dbaf4af5d623d80da commit-date: 2022-07-23 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.64.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` `rustc ./src/test/ui/async-await/issue-73050.rs --edition=2018 -Zcrate-attr="feature(generic_const_exprs)"`
Backtrace
